name: splendor-game
description: A web-based implementation of the Splendor board game

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run client:test && npm run shared:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.kill: pkill -f 'node.*vite|nodemon|ts-node' || sudo lsof -ti:3000,3001,3002 | xargs -r sudo kill -9 || true
scripts.docs:build: echo 'API docs are generated from OpenAPI spec'
scripts.docs:serve: echo 'Docs served at http://localhost:3001/docs/index.html when server is running'
